title: LEAVER BUSTERS

embed.description: This 5 low priority que for 20 mins each is so BS. let's do the math 20 * 5 = 100 mins not including game times. average games on aram are what 20 - 30 mins. let's say all 5 arams are 20 mins long thats another 100 mins.

body:
I need help.... I don't have the best PC and for that I get penalized with leaver busters... Its so unfair ! Its not my fault that my pc isnt good and the game crashes once every 3-4 games :( I spend money on this game and play it almost every day ! I understand that it is good for people that actually leave the game midway through and make their team lose ,but like come on there are people that never leave games and still get leaver busters because of bug splats and stupid PC crashes. Ive legit just been thru like 15 20min bugsplats. :(
Can we fix this please :(

No harm meant in this comment just please help us and get rid of leaver busters !
(Sorry bad english)

:)

replies.body: I know it's not your intention to leave, but the pain of being down a player is just as negative so [leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) treats everyone equally.  If you want to toss more more info like what's happening, when, and any error messages I would be happy to help troubleshoot.  Until then, it may be a good idea to avoid matchmaking until this gets worked out.
